summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of RTP receiving components, including NACK generation, packet processing, error handling, statistical calculations, and timestamp mapping, using mock transports and simulated packet streams.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the RTP receiver implementation to ensure reliable realâ€‘time media delivery, proper loss detection and recovery, accurate stream statistics, and correct timestamp conversion in a WebRTC library.
